question.title: What is the term for the early onset of puberty in girls?
question.description: A medical condition characterized by the development of secondary sexual characteristics at an age earlier than 8 years.

option_a.title: Precocious puberty
option_a.description: A rare condition where children develop physically and sexually in advance of their peers.

option_b.title: Early puberty
option_b.description: A normal process of physical development that occurs in some children earlier than average.

option_c.title: Delayed puberty
option_c.description: A condition where children develop physically and sexually later than their peers.

option_d.title: Pathological puberty
option_d.description: A condition where the development of secondary sexual characteristics is abnormal or premature.

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The first letter of the correct option
